revisions.rev:
{{primary sources|date=September 2011}} {{Infobox software | name = Free Download Manager | logo = [[File:FDM icon.png|48px]] | screenshot = [[File:Free Download Manager.png|300px]] | caption = Free Download Manager in [[Windows Vista]] | author = | developer = Free Download Manager development team | released = 2004 | frequently updated = yes | programming language = [[C++]] | operating system = [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] ([[Linux]] and [[MacOS X]] version under development) | language = [[Multilingualism|Multilingual]] | status = Active | genre = [[Download manager]], [[BitTorrent client]] | license = [[GNU General Public License|GPL]] version 3[http://www.freedownloadmanager.org/blog/2007/08/15/fdm-25-is-released/ Free Download Manager Â» Blog Archive Â» FDM 2.5 is released!] | website = [http://www.freedownloadmanager.org/ www.freedownloadmanager.org] }} '''Free Download Manager''' is a free [[Open source software|open source]] [[GUI|graphical]] [[download manager]] for the [[Microsoft Windows]] [[operating system]]. FDM was previously proprietary software, but with the release of version 2.5 it has been [[open source]]. Starting with version 3.0.850 (15 April 2010), source code is no longer provided as a packaged download, but is available in the projects [[Subversion (software)|Subversion repository]].http://freedownload.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/freedownload/ Free Download Manager received a 2007 [[Webuser]] Gold Award.{{cite web |url=http://www.webuser.co.uk/products/Free_Download_Manager_review_4184.html |title=Free Download Manager Review - Web-User |accessdate=2008-09-11 |author=Andy Shaw |work=[[Webuser]] |publisher=[[IPC Media]] }}{{Dead link|date=August 2011}} ==Features== *Translations into several languages. *The [[Graphical user interface|GUI]] presents several tabs that organise types of downloads and allow access to different features in the program. *Download information view that shows each downloads [[progress bar]], file preview, community opinions if any are written for that download and a log showing connection status. *Drop box for file [[drag-and-drop]]. *HTTP & FTP download support. *Batch downloading support for downloading a set of files. *[[BitTorrent (protocol)|BitTorrent]] support (based on [[Libtorrent (Rasterbar)|Libtorrent]]). *[[Metalink]] support, for easy downloading from mirrors. *Flash video download from sites like [[Youtube]] and [[Google Video]] *Resuming broken downloads, if permitted by server. *Download throttling via three fully customizable traffic modes, light, medium and heavy. *Import list of [[Uniform Resource Locator|urls]] from clipboard. *Remote control via internet ===Tabs=== '''Downloads''' - This is the focal point of the program, which is simply a download manager. Users can also create groups with folders to which files with specific [[file extension|extensions]] will be downloaded.
'''Flash video downloads''' - This feature helps users to download [[FLV]] video files from [[Youtube]], [[Google Video]] and many other site.
'''Torrents''' - Allows to download torrent files.
'''Uploads''' - Allows users to upload and share files with other users.
'''Scheduler''' - Users can create and manage lists of tasks to be executed at a preset time. Tasks include launching external programs, starting and stopping downloads, and shutting down the computer in all possible ways.
'''Site Explorer''' - This feature is an [[File Transfer Protocol|FTP]] client.
'''Site Manager''' - This feature allows users to tell FDM how to act with specific sites, such as websites that require authentication, or how many download connections a website can accept simultaneously from the user.
'''HTML Spider''' - This feature can download a website by following and downloading links recursively. ===Integration=== FDM interfaces with the following [[web browser]]s: *[[Internet Explorer]] *[[Google Chrome]] *[[Opera (web browser)|Opera]] *[[Mozilla Firefox]] *[[Netscape (web browser)|Netscape]] *[[Apple Safari]] *[[SeaMonkey]] ==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} *[[BitTorrent client]] *[[Comparison of file sharing applications]] *[[Comparison of download managers]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.freedownloadmanager.org/ Official Website] *{{SourceForge|freedownload|Free Download Manager}} {{Download managers}} {{Use dmy dates|date=August 2011}} [[Category:2004 software]] [[Category:Download managers]] [[Category:Free BitTorrent clients]] [[Category:Free software programmed in C++]] [[Category:Windows-only free software]] [[Category:Formerly proprietary software]] [[Category:Portable software]] [[cs:Free Download Manager]] [[de:Free Download Manager]] [[es:Free Download Manager]] [[fr:Free Download Manager]] [[it:Free Download Manager]] [[pl:Free Download Manager]] [[pt:Free Download Manager]] [[ru:Free Download Manager]]
